resources.string:
"Activi

Activi is a native mobile application that allows users to create and join nearby events on the fly.

Activi provides an innovative solution to the isolating culture of modernity by leveraging mobile technology to draw users closer together in the real world. In effect, the app provides a service that strengthens interpersonal engagement and community connections by providing users the opportunity to engage in spur of the moment activities in their area.
